name: Enoch
description: Enoch is to provide a platform that empowers individuals to express themselves freely and authentically through social mediums like home feed, podcasts and live events while creating a safe and inclusive space. We are dedicated to creating a social media experience that reflects the values of freedom of speech, freedom of expression and online privacy. At Enoch, we believe that the power of community is what makes social media truly valuable. That's why we are committed to building a strong and supportive community of individuals who share our passion for free speech and expression. Get ready to dive into a world of endless possibilities - with Enoch, you can create and join spheres and communities, share posts, jobs, and ads, and even create your very own NFTs! Showcase your talents with our incredible reels and professional pages, and keep track of your personal finances with our wallet, gift card, dashboard, billing, and monetization tools. Enoch also offers amazing opportunities for developers with our Enoch for Developer program, and advertising solutions with our ad manager and Enoch Ad. And for those interested in DeFi, our Open Finance feature allows you to trade, swap, and bridge your assets with ease.
